title: No more queues: Kuwait launches online passport update service for expatriates
summary_full: Kuwait's Ministry of Interior has launched a new digital service via the Sahel app for expatriates to update passport details. This initiative eliminates the need for in-person visits to service centers, streamlining administrative processes and enhancing digital government efficiency for residents.
